name: css-font-face-src
description: A CSS @font-face src property value parser

scripts.build: npm run build:grammar && npm run build:ts && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:grammar: peggy --plugin ts-pegjs -d util:../util -o src/grammar/index.ts src/grammar/grammar.peg # the ../util path is relative to src/grammar, i.e. where the output file src/grammar/index.ts sits
scripts.build:umd: mkdir -p dist/umd && browserify --standalone cssFontFaceSrc src/index.ts -p [ tsify ] -o dist/umd/index.js
scripts.examples: npm run examples:cjs && npm run examples:esm && npm run examples:ts
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:jest && npm run test:dist
scripts.test:dist: npm run build:umd && npm run test:smoketest
